title: HOUR 3- Mike Tyson 080420
itunes:title: HOUR 3- Mike Tyson 080420
description:
Mike Tyson tells Dan how he ended up with a scheduled 8 round exhibition with Roy Jones Jr. Mike says he really never saw fear in an opponent he was about to box; but Mike says it was intimidation so they could not perform at their top level.
